channel.title: Comments on: Photo page ready to go
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: elenore
item.description: the pictures are awesome thanks will and marcus
item.content:encoded:
the pictures are awesome
thanks will and marcus

item.title: by: marcus
item.description: what can i say it's all about the benjamins.... I mean yuan.
item.content:encoded: what can i say it’s all about the benjamins…. I mean yuan.

item.title: by: Amy Bugg
item.description: Now that's what I call service!!

item.title: by: Amy Bugg
item.description: I love the pictures Will! Now I want to see pictures of your little room, and your thermos, and where you teach, so I can picture you there. =)
item.content:encoded: I love the pictures Will! Now I want to see pictures of your little room, and your thermos, and where you teach, so I can picture you there. =)

item.title: by: Hoyt
item.description: I imagined May looking a lot more like Cindy Crawford. Other than that my impression of the whole photos thing was all, "Wow, fuck, it's real!" A very handy supplement to your wonderfull adventure blog, Mr. Sanderson. I will drink around the peepee part in your honor tonight.
item.content:encoded: I imagined May looking a lot more like Cindy Crawford. Other than that my impression of the whole photos thing was all, “Wow, fuck, it’s real!” A very handy supplement to your wonderfull adventure blog, Mr. Sanderson. I will drink around the peepee part in your honor tonight.
